privacy_text: At Turistik, we are committed to protecting our users' privacy. We collect personal information such as name, email, location, and travel preferences to enhance our tourism services, manage bookings, and personalize the experience. We do not share your data with third parties, except with necessary service providers or in compliance with the law. We implement security measures to protect your information, and you can access, correct, or delete your data at any time. We also use cookies to optimize navigation. For any questions, you can contact us at <1>info@turistik.cl</1>.
